properties.name: incident.close.minutes.before
properties.description: Duration of minutes before now where incident are closed.

properties.name: incident.close.minutes.after
properties.description: Duration of minutes after incident closed to send kafka message to remove blue indicator in the map.

properties.name: incident.close.provider.url
properties.description: URL for incident provider end point.

properties.name: incident.close.provider.path
properties.description: URL path for incident provider end point.

properties.name: incident.close.provider.timeout
properties.description: Timeout when connecting to incident provider end point.

properties.name: incident.kafka.topic
properties.description: Kafka topic for used for incident.
